dataList.name: Reminisced Augmentation
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if at less than 50% HP, heal 20% of Max HP.

dataList.name: Gloomy Noises
dataList.desc: After losing a clash, gain 1 Fragile.

dataList.name: Blue Resin
dataList.desc: When an Eye Part breaks, the enemy with the least SP loses 35 SP.

dataList.name: Septic Weakness
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 3 Fragile if the Part is broken.

dataList.name: Initiating Town Tour
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if Charge Count is at 10+, change behavior.

dataList.name: Damage Detected!
dataList.desc:
When this unit is defeated, Kqe-1j-23 takes 100 damage and becomes Staggered next turn.
It then loses arm-related skills for the rest of the battle.

dataList.name: Overload
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if below 60 HP, enter a powered-up state.

dataList.name: Overloaded HP Bullet
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, gain 2 Damage Up and 2 Fragile.

dataList.name: Dhyāna
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if an ally is present, gain 10 Protection.

dataList.name: ANIKSHANA
dataList.desc: NOT FOR SEEING OR LOOKING AT

dataList.name: Cyclical Karma
dataList.desc:
All units transfer 10 of their Karma to their targets after a successful attack.
(5 more Karma is transferred per Clash count.)
Karma is not transferred to My Form Empties as long as its allies are alive.

dataList.name: Anatman
dataList.desc:
At the start of the turn, if the Mūrti is broken, apply 30 Karma and 3 Fragile to a random other ally, then enter a mode of Anatman (Non-Self).
During this state, the Abnormality’s behavior changes, and all its attacks target units indiscriminately.

dataList.name: Nirmāna
dataList.desc: Whenever the Mūrti recovers, its Max HP increases by 20%.

dataList.name: THREE WISE TEXTS
dataList.desc:
SEE OF NO TEXT HERE
HEAR OF NO TEXT HERE
SPEAK OF NO TEXT HERE

dataList.name: Bhaishajya
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, fully recover HP.

dataList.name: HP Ampule Injection
dataList.desc: At the start of the turn, if this unit’s HP is not at full, heal 25% of Max HP. (Up to 3 times)
